question:
The National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture was launched by subsuming which of the following schemes?
1. Rainfed Area Development Programme
2. National Mission on Micro Irrigation
3. National Project on Organic Farming
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation: NMSA is one of the eight Missions outlined under National Action Plan on Climate Change. NMSA as a restructured Mission for 12th Plan has been conceptualized by subsuming Rainfed Area Development Programme (RADP), National Mission on Micro Irrigation (NMMI), National Project on Organic Farming (NPOF), National Project on Management of Soil Health & Fertility (NPMSH&F) and Soil and Land Use Survey of India under its domain.
